alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:27PM EDT until May 12 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DECATUR AND SOUTHWESTERN GRADY COUNTIES... At 327 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Whigham, or 11 miles west of Cairo, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Whigham, Attapulgus, Climax, Nickleville and Fowlstown. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
